descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia]Dark story for vigilant of Stendarr. [/font]
[font=Georgia]A lot of unique armors and weapons, rings, creatures etc.[/font]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11849/?]SE version[/url]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia][size=3]Language Support[/size][/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia]Japanese[/font]

[font=Georgia][size=3][u]Translation[/u][/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74450/?][font=Georgia]Chinese[/font][/url]
[url=http://halomano.egloos.com/5363293][font=Georgia]Korean[/font][/url]
[font=Georgia][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83876/?]English[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81891/?]German[/url][/font]
﻿[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88482][font=Georgia]Spanish[/font][/url]

[font=Georgia]Check version of Translation. Version mismatch between esp and bsa have risk of CTD.
Latest version is[/font] [size=3][u]1.3.0[/u][/size].

[font=Georgia][u][size=3]Voice Act[/size][/u]
[/font][font=Georgia][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83876/?]VIGILANT Voiced - English Addon[/url] by The Skyrim Voice Alliance 
[/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia][size=3]Requirement[/size][/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[list]
[*][size=2]Skyrim 1.9 or higher[/size]
[*][size=2]Dawnguard, Dragonborn[/size]
[/list]
[font=Georgia]HiResTextures Pack requires midrange pc or upper.[/font]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia][size=3]Installation[/size][/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[list=1]
[*][size=2]Check Requirement[/size]
[*][size=2]Install Vigilant.esp and Vigilant.bsa in Skyrim\Data\[/size]
[*][size=2]Wait/sleep several hours in game. Save&Reload.[/size]
[/list]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia][size=3]Update[/size][/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[list]
[*][size=2]Updatable v1.0.x, 1.1.0, v1.2.0 to v1.2.2[/size]
[/list]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia][size=3]VIDEOS[/size][/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[youtube]8eJYcGUqzME[/youtube][youtube]D1rR8K3LtiI[/youtube]
by  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5993230/?]shinji72[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3329368/?]Tyroine[/url]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia][size=3]Quest[/size][/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TwL4Imw.jpg<img src=[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/qtuUB4E.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia]Ep1:The Summoner (Tutorial)
Player become vigilant of stendarr. And chase a summoner of Molag bal.
(Quest Start)Talk to Altano in Dawnster Inn.[/font]

[font=Georgia]Ep2:Bloody Matron (Small Dungeon)
Player research Windhelm Prisoner Disappearance Case.
(Quest Start)After Ep1, Get in and out of temple until windhelm guard appear in front of temple.[/font]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/R6RYzib.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/46NJtSL.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia]Ep3:Child of Oblivion (Horror, Hide and Seek)
Player get rescue request from noble mansion.
(Quest Start)After Ep2, Get in and out of temple until Librarian get new topic.[/font]

[font=Georgia]Ep4:Oblivion (New world, Non-Journal)
Player get trapped in oblivion. And wander wasteland to find a way to get out.
(Quest Start)Automatically start after Ep3.
[/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia][size=3]Special Crafting[/size][/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Fiu0hGe.png[/img]
[font=Georgia]You can craft unique armors and weapons, color variations by Anvil of Zenithar.
Crafting unique items is unlocked by finishing objectives/defeating boss/reaching new area. [/font]

[font=Georgia]You can find Anvil of Zenithar in[/font]
[list]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Temple of Stendarr[/size][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Beacon of Stendarr Basement[/size][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Blacksmith of Waterfront District[/size][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Colosseum[/size][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Library of Jhunal[/size][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Debug Room[/size][/font]
[/list]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia][size=3]Debug Room[/size][/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67103-0-1495291457.jpg[/img][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67103-1-1495291457.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia]Debug Room is in Storage Room of Temple of Stendarr. Key is in Owl Statue. (Cell ID: zzzAoMDebugRoom)[/font]

[font=Georgia][size=3]Paintings (Episode Skip)[/size]
[/font][list]
[*][size=2][font=Georgia]"Hope" : You can skip Ep[/font][font=Verdana]1[/font][font=Georgia].[/font][/size]
[*][size=2][font=Georgia]"Water Snakes" : You can skip Ep[/font][font=Verdana]2[/font][font=Georgia].[/font][/size]
[*][size=2][font=Georgia]"Water Spirits" : You can skip Ep[/font][font=Verdana]3[/font][font=Georgia].[/font][/size]
[*][size=2][font=Georgia]"Death" : You can start Ep[/font][font=Verdana]4[/font][font=Georgia] after Ep[/font][font=Verdana]3[/font][font=Georgia].[/font][/size]
[/list]
[font=Georgia][size=3]Owls (Merchant)[/size]
[/font][list]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]White Owl : You can buy All Armors of VIGILANT.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Georgia][size=2]Black Owl : You can buy All Weapons, Misc of VIGILANT.[/size][/font]
[/list]
[font=Georgia][size=3]Lute[/size]
Fix Looping Music.[/font]

[font=Georgia][size=3]Red Stone[/size]
You can access Coldharbour after Ep[/font][font=Verdana]4[/font][font=Georgia] launched. Key is in corpse.[/font]

[font=Georgia][size=3]Tree of Life[/size]
You can access Elder Field after True Ending. Key is in corpse.
[/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Georgia][size=3]My Quest Mods[/size][/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77510/?][font=Georgia]GLENMORIL
[/font][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80425?][font=Georgia]Unslaad
[/font][/url]
author: Vicn

files.name: VIGILANT v130
files.changelogHtml:
NEW
-Added Weapon Arts for unique weapons. Use shout/Power slot. Right handed only.
-Added new solutions for act 1. You can banish daedra by activate "???" at daedra's feet if comjuration skill enough.
-Added 2 spells for Act3. "Aural decoy", "Hidden Body"
-Added 1 lantern. "Arcane of Jhunarl"

Fixes
-Improved Quest Alias allocation, Persistent setting of NPCs.
-Reduced Draw-calls of objects of Coldharbour.
-Improved LOD object and textures.
-Decreased the possibility of Music Looping Bug.
-Improved some of Level design of Dungeons.
-Fixed Armor add-on of helmet of Morihaus and Umaril, Aurorans.
-Added more food and drink in vendors and deads of coldharbour.
-Fixed Bourlor AI stuck.
-Lowered Max Level of Bosses.


Updatable 1.2.x to 1.3.0
Not recommended to update on mid play-through of following quests due to changing alias allocation method.
Act1""Old paladin"
Act3"Child of Oblivion"
Act4 "VS Dro'zel"
Memory quests of Act4
